name: .RGS File Extension
summary: Learn about .RGS files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Script used by ATL (Active Template Library) C++ projects, Microsoft Visual Studio, Flexera InstallShield, and other software development and deployment programs; contains code that registers the software with Windows.

content: Registry scripts are often built into .DLL files, which subsequently are used to add, remove, or alter the Windows registry when an application is installed.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
